text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Faulty initial test for the coronavirus created during Trump admin early 2020 by the CDC. This is a new virus that was first identified this year, the bad tests couldn't possibly be "inherited."
#TrumpCrimeFamily #LiarTrump #TrumpLiesAmericansDie #coronavirus #notcapableoftruth
